turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm calling about a charge on my recent bill. I was charged $75 when my monthly subscription is supposed to be $50. I'm pretty frustrated about this.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I understand you're calling about a billing discrepancy. I can definitely help with that. Could you please provide me with your account number or the phone number associated with your account?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. One moment while I pull up your account information... Okay, I see the $75 charge. It looks like a promotional discount expired this month. Are you aware of any promotions that you may have had when you first signed up?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: A promotional discount? Nobody told me it was going to expire! Why wasn't I notified? Is there anything you can do to honor the original price, since I was never told about it expiring?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. Let me check what options are available to me... Okay, I can offer you a one-time credit of $25 to cover the difference this month as a courtesy. Would that be acceptable?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: That sounds great, thank you so much! Will my bill go back to $50 next month automatically, or do I need to do something to ensure that happens?
